translation.en: And I'm pretty sure I'm a psychopath.
translation.es: Y estoy casi seguro de que soy un psicópata.

translation.en: [James] I was eight when I realized I didn't have a sense of humor.
translation.es: A los ocho, supe que no tenía sentido del humor.

translation.en: [man] Why doesn't the Queen wave with this hand?
translation.es: ¿Por qué la Reina no saluda con esta mano?

translation.en: Eh? Why doesn't the Queen wave with this hand?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no saluda con esta mano?

translation.en: I'd always wanted to punch my dad in the face.
translation.es: Siempre quise golpearlo en la cara.

translation.en: When I was nine, he bought a deep-fat fryer.
translation.es: A los nueve, compró una freidora.

translation.en: He saw it on an American shopping channel.
translation.es: La vio en un canal de televentas.

translation.en: One day, I put my hand in it.
translation.es: Un día, metí la mano en ella.

translation.en: I wanted to make myself feel something.
When I was 15, I put my neighbor's cat in a box
translation.es: A los 15, tomé al gato de mi vecino

translation.en: and took it into the woods.
After that, I killed more animals.
translation.es: Después de eso, maté más animales.

translation.en: And I remember every single one.
translation.es: Recuerdo a cada uno de ellos.
La escuela no estaba a mi nivel,

translation.en: but it was a good place for observation and selection
translation.es: pero era un buen lugar para observar y elegir.

translation.en: I was gonna kill something bigger,
translation.es: Iba a matar algo más grande.

translation.en: [Alyssa] I get these moments when I have to lie down
because everything feels, sort of, too much.
And I look up and see the blue or the grey or the black
translation.es: Y miro hacia arriba y veo el azul o el gris o el negro

translation.en: and I feel myself melting into it.
And for, like, a split second, I feel free
translation.es: Y por un instante me siento libre.

translation.en: [woman whispers] Your presence is required, young lady.
Why are you talking like Downton Abbey?
[Alyssa] My mum used to be nice, but then she divorced my dad
translation.es: Mi mamá era amable, pero se divorció de mi papá

translation.en: Last week, he said he thought I needed a bigger bra.
translation.es: Un día dijo que usara un sostén más grande.

translation.en: So I threw a Chicken Kiev at his head.
translation.es: así que le arrojé un pedazo de pollo.

translation.en: Mum pretended that she hadn't heard him.
translation.es: Mi mamá fingió no haberlo oído.

translation.en: Now she has the perfect house and the perfect garden
translation.es: Ahora tiene la casa y el jardín perfecto

translation.en: their heads do smell nice, though.
I haven't see my dad since I was eight.
translation.es: No veo a mi papá desde los ocho años.

translation.en: He never fitted in. He couldn't settle.
translation.es: Nunca se adaptó. No podía asentarse.

translation.en: But he sends me a card, without fail, every single birthday.
translation.es: Pero cada cumpleaños me envía una tarjeta.

translation.en: I don't trust people who fit in.
translation.es: No confío en la gente que se adapta.

translation.en: [Alyssa] I'm not saying he's the answer,
translation.es: No digo que él es la respuesta.

translation.en: I thought she could be interesting to kill.
[James] So I pretended to fall in love with her.
translation.es: Así que fingí enamorarme de ella.

translation.en: I don't have a phone either.
[James] I knew that people in love went out on dates.
translation.es: Sabía que los enamorados tenían citas.

translation.en: Do you wanna go on a date?
Hi, what can I get for you today?
"One of the top 10 greatest American dining experiences"? Yeah!
translation.es: ¿Uno de los mejores restaurantes de la región? Sí.

translation.en: And a hot chocolate with cream.
[giggles insincerely] And an extra fucking spoon.
Sorry. You can't use language like that,
otherwise I'm gonna have to ask you and your boyfriend to leave.
translation.es: Tendré que pedirles a ti y a tu novio que se vayan.

translation.en: with extra fucking cherries all on top of it.
OK, sorry, that's it. Right. [shouts] Marvin!
See if Marvin can make a banana split for me, you fucking cunt!
translation.es: ¡Fíjate si Marvin puede prepararme un banana split, maldita perra!

translation.en: [James] It seemed that Alyssa had some issues.
I think we live in the most boring town on the planet.
translation.es: Creo que vivimos en la ciudad más aburrida del planeta.

translation.en: Well, they've got money. They feel safe.
translation.es: Bueno, tienen dinero. Se sienten seguros.

translation.en: She's the only cool person in this town.
translation.es: Ella es la única persona genial de aquí.

translation.en: and had, like, 15 abortions when it was illegal or something.
translation.es: y se hizo como 15 abortos cuando era ilegal o algo así.

translation.en: Can we go to your house?
Why do you live in such a weird house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué vives en una casa tan rara?

translation.en: -This is pretty retro. -I don't like it.
translation.es: - Esto es bastante retro. - No me gusta.

translation.en: [James] Alyssa was kind of a nymphomaniac.
translation.es: Alyssa era una especie de ninfómana.

translation.en: I tell you what. I've never been sure if he even, you know...
translation.es: Te diré algo, nunca estuve seguro si él aún... ya sabes.

translation.en: I always thought there was something wrong with him!
translation.es: Siempre pensé que había algo mal en él.

translation.en: [James] I actually masturbated once a week for medical purposes.
translation.es: Me masturbaba una vez a la semana por razones médicas.

translation.en: I knew it wasn't good to let things build up.
translation.es: Sabía que acumular no era bueno.

translation.en: I thought probably he was gay.

translation.es: Lo que... está bien. O sea...

translation.en: We're dealing with a really broad spectrum these days.
translation.es: Hoy en día existe una gran variedad.

translation.en: Sometimes, I feel like punching him in the face.
translation.es: A veces quisiera golpearlo en la cara.

translation.en: Have you ever eaten a pussy before?
[James] It was important to be confident in moments like this.
translation.es: Era importante estar seguro en momentos como este.

translation.en: I want you to eat mine.
Actually, I was ready at ten.
It was important to work out the exact logistics beforehand.
translation.es: Era importante calcular la logística con antelación.

translation.en: When it got to 12, I started to think she might not be coming.
translation.es: A las 12, comencé a pensar que quizá no vendría.

translation.en: [Alyssa] Sometimes, I worry that I ruin things.
translation.es: A veces, me preocupa arruinarlo todo.

translation.en: Put these on and come downstairs.
No way, I told you. I'm going out.
translation.es: Claro que no. Te dije que saldría.

translation.en: [whispers] I am not having this argument again, Alyssa.
translation.es: No discutiré esto de nuevo, Alyssa.

translation.en: Please, love. I want you to be there.
translation.es: Por favor, cariño. Quiero que estés ahí.

translation.en: Right. Those aren't for you. Hand them round.
This is a load of bullshit.
Oh, well, if you hate it so much...
You look good when you make an effort, don't you?
translation.es: Te ves bien cuando haces un esfuerzo.

translation.en: [Alyssa] Sometimes, everything is suddenly really simple.
translation.es: A veces, de repente todo es muy simple.

translation.en: It's like everything shifts in a moment.
translation.es: Es como si todo cambiara en un momento.

translation.en: And you step out of your body,
You step out and you see where you are really clearly.
translation.es: Sales y ves muy claramente dónde estás.

translation.en: [Alyssa] I think being angry and sad at the same time really turns me on.
translation.es: Creo que estar enojada y triste al mismo tiempo me excita.

translation.en: [Alyssa] I think I could fall in love with him.
translation.es: Creo que podría enamorarme de él.

translation.en: [James] I wondered if it'd be easier to slit her throat if I flipped her round.
translation.es: Me pregunté si sería más fácil degollarla si la volteaba.

translation.en: Whether it would be better not to see her face,
translation.es: Si sería mejor no ver su cara.

translation.en: Let's leave this shithole town. Now.
translation.es: Vámonos ya de esta ciudad de mierda.

translation.en: You hate it. I hate it. Our parents are dickheads.
translation.es: Ambos la odiamos. Nuestros papás son unos idiotas.
- Es de mi padre. - Es un imbécil.

translation.en: I'm going, whether you come with me or not. Are you in?
translation.es: Me voy sin importar si vienes o no. ¿Vienes?

translation.en: [James] I didn't know where we were going, or when I was gonna kill her,
translation.es: No sabía adónde íbamos ni cuándo iba a matarla,

translation.en: but I punched my dad in the face and stole his car.
translation.es: pero golpeé a mi padre y robé su auto.

translation.en: And that felt like a good place to start.
translation.es: Y parecía un buen punto de partida.
